Source.name: EBS Sensor: FIN AR Receipts have inconsistent EVENT ID in APP and UNAPP Rows - Weekly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: FIN AR Receipts have inconsistent EVENT ID in APP and UNAPP Rows - Weekly
Source.Description: Receipts have inconsistent EVENT_ID in APP and UNAPP Rows in AR_RECEIVABLE_APPLICATIONS_ALL.

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_FIN_AR_APP_UNAPP_DIFF_EVENT_ID' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'CASH_RECEIPT_ID:' || s.CASH_RECEIPT_ID || ', APP_EVENT_ID:' || s.APP_EVENT_ID || ', UNAPP_EVENT_ID:' || s.UNAPP_EVENT_ID || ', UNAPP_GL_POSTED_DATE:' || s.UNAPP_GL_POSTED_DATE || ', USER_NAME:' || s.USER_NAME || ', RESP_ID:' || s.RESP_ID key_data FROM (select cash_receipt_id CASH_RECEIPT_ID, app_event_id APP_EVENT_ID, unapp_event_id UNAPP_EVENT_ID, unapp_gl_posted_date UNAPP_GL_POSTED_DATE, user_name USER_NAME, resp_id RESP_ID from ( select distinct ra.cash_receipt_id CASH_RECEIPT_ID, ra.event_id APP_EVENT_ID, ra_unapp.event_id UNAPP_EVENT_ID, ra_unapp.gl_posted_date UNAPP_GL_POSTED_DATE, users.user_name USER_NAME, ( SELECT min(responsibility_id) FROM apps.fnd_responsibility resp WHERE application_id = 222 ) resp_id from apps.ar_receivable_applications_all ra_unapp, apps.ar_receivable_applications_all ra, apps.ar_distributions_all ard_unapp, apps.fnd_user users where ra.created_by = users.user_id and ra_unapp.status = 'UNAPP' and ra_unapp.cash_receipt_id = ra.cash_receipt_id and ra.status <> 'UNAPP' and ra_unapp.event_id <> ra.event_id and ra_unapp.gl_date = ra.gl_date and ra.posting_control_id <> -3 and ra_unapp.posting_control_id = -3 and ra_unapp.receivable_application_id = ard_unapp.source_id and ard_unapp.source_table = 'RA' and ard_unapp.source_id_secondary = ra.receivable_application_id and ra.gl_date between sysdate-30 and sysdate+30 and rownum <= 5 )) s
